version_description:
- 将您喜欢的站点添加到白名单
- 自动更新内容阻止列表
- 其他Bug修复和改进

- 将您喜欢的站点添加到白名单
- 自动更新内容阻止列表
- 其他Bug修复和改进

Adblock Plus is back and better than ever!
Experience a sleeker, more modern user interface, with the most powerful ad-blocking technology.

What's new?
- The entire app has been re-written from the ground up so past bugs are gone
- New improved user experience with easier navigation
- Dark mode

Get it now!

Questions or feedback? Send us a message at support@adblockplus.org.
Like the app? Write a review?

ABP 2.0.1 for Safari on iOS is here with bug fixes and improved filter lists.
Please open ABP after updating so that the new filter lists are immediately synced!

What’s new?
- Improved ad blocking quality
- Minor bug fixes

Get it now!

Questions or feedback? Send us a message at support@adblockplus.org.
Like the app? Write a review?

We've listened to your feedback and the team has been spending a lot of time on optimising our filter lists, and with ABP 2.0.2 for Safari on iOS, we bring you the best content blocking experience possible!

**Please open ABP after updating so that the new filter lists are immediately synced!**

What's New?
- Improved ad blocking quality
- Minor bug fixes

Get it now!

Questions or feedback? Send us a message at support@adblockplus.org.
Like the app? Write a review :)
